author: Bergenator 9264

text:
If you can break the boundary of this game, you might see peoples outside the map that it can be seen at the area behind the warp tiles (other areas). Because this game uses the same method as GTA 3 above to render its world.

To break the boundary, follow the step in Son of the Glitch video about Shenmue. It takes place on Dobuita stairs. It's located on the gang next to the You Arcade, near the noodle shop and the playground.

text: I love this game when I was young and even now. I have Shenmue for dreamcast and shenmue 2 for xbox. Though it was underrated, I believe it to be one of the best game I ever played.
author: Jay Dee

text: This is the game that turned me into a sega fanboy for life.  I eventually grew tired of military FPS, JRPG and sport games but I never gave up on Sonic, Shining Force, Phantasy Star, Jet Grind Radio or any other IP from Sega.  It's a damn shame nobody wants to push modern gamers out of their comfort zone.  In 2011, it has come down to "Modern Warfare 3 vs Battlefield 3".

text:
Shenmue! A series that never really got to be as great as it should have been. GTA can eat it's hart out. This is the best sandbox game ever!

Now...if only Sega wouldn't have pulled the plug on the series. What is with Sega taking great series and killing them all the while destroying their mascot?
